name: Foundation
description: My stay all day, full coverage foundation with a natural matte finish!

name: Blush
description: Easy liquid blush! Pink matte blush wand for a beautifying pop of colour!

name: Eyebrow pencil
description: Cream-wax refillable eyebrow pencil to fill, add shape and structure to your brows.

name: Eye cream
description: My hydrating, smoothing, brightening effect eye cream!

name: Concealer
description: Medium-coverage hydrating concealer to conceal, correct, brighten, and lift the look of your eyes and face!

name: Cream
description: Insatnt Turnaround moisturiser for hydrated, glowing, plumper looking skin!

name: Lip liner
description: My iconic nude-pink lip liner pencil that suits everyone for a defined, fuller looking Pillow Talk pout!

name: Eyeliner
description: Peachy-nude and navy eyeliner duo for eyes that look bigger, brighter and wide awake!

name: Gloss
description: Hydrating, plump-effect lip gloss in pearlescent pink for love-glazed lips with a dazzling diamond finish!

name: Lipstick
description: My ICONIC matte nude-pink lipstick for a kiss of Pillow Talk magic!

name: Mascara
description: Pillow Talk mascara in a jet-black shade for instant volume, length, stretch and a 24-Hour vertical lift effect!

name: Makeup remover
description: My oil-based bi-phase makeup remover with eyebright + Chamomile for your eyes, lashes and lips!

name: Serum
description: A supercharged serum with clinically proven hydration & benefits!

name: Eye palette
description: 6-shade eyeshadow palette including bronze, pink, terracotta & brown shades.
